title: OK Fed of Colored Womens Clubs banner - context

content.question: Which of the following is most directly related to the social advancement of African American female leaders at the turn of the twentieth century?

choices.label: Booker T. Washington organized Black womenâ€™s suffrage protests.
Harriet Jacobs wrote first hand accounts of life under slavery in the nineteenth century.
Organized Black labor unions created advertisement banners to encourage members to join.
Nannie Helen Burroughs helped establish the National Association of Colored Women.

content.answer: Nannie Helen Burroughs helped establish the National Association of Colored Women.

topic.text: 3.8: Lifting as We Climb: Uplift Ideologies and Black Women's Rights and Leadership

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
